title: A Challenge

en: Hey, I need to talk to you. I looked into how much money you made last month... and then also looked over your general business plan.

I know I was going to try and let you do your own thing, but this is crazy. We're a partnership, and I can't help but feel like you're putting us in danger. There's no way this is going to be sustainable.

But I know this means a lot to you. Even if I want you to stop, that isn't fair of me. So I have a proposition. If you can make enough money to cover rent this month, $2000, then I'll be quiet and trust your decisions from now on.
But if you can't do that, then I can't support you in this.

no_caption: But what will happen if I fail?

en: skylar::"Okay. Thank you for being okay with this. It's just so risky. You know how my mom is, running her little scams and always chasing the next big money-making scheme..."
skylar::"It's just so scary for me, I feel like I've only been getting more and more anxious."

skylar::"I don't know what will happen. I don't want to force you to give up your dream, but I just - I can't live with this kind of insecurity. It's been so stressful for me. I know it's not about me, but..."
